00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 // Function: EndpointItem()
00037 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 EndpointItem::EndpointItem(ProgramEntityItem* parentNode, QString const& name,
00039                            MCAPIEndpointDirection type, MCAPIDataType connType,
00040                            QGraphicsItem* parent) : QAbstractGraphicsShapeItem(parent),
00041                                                     parentProgEntity_(parentNode), name_(name),
00042                                                     type_(type), connType_(connType), portID_(-1),
00043                                                     textLabel_(0), dir_(DIR_LEFT), oldPos_()
00044 {
00045     Q_ASSERT(parentNode != 0);
00046 
00047     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00048     setFlag(ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00049     setFlag(ItemSendsScenePositionChanges);
00050     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00051     setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0));
00052     
00053     textLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem(this);
00054 
00055     textLabel_->setPos(-WIDTH / 2 + ARROW_WIDTH + 5, 2 - HEIGHT / 2);
00056     updateText();
00057     updateVisuals();
00058 }
00059 
00060 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 // Function: ~EndpointItem()
00062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 EndpointItem::~EndpointItem()
00064 {
00065     // Remove all connections.
00066     foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, getConnections())
00067     {
00068         delete conn;
00069     }
00070         
00071     // Remove the endpoint from the stack where it resides.
00072     EndpointStack* stack = dynamic_cast<EndpointStack*>(parentItem());
00073 
00074     if (stack != 0)
00075     {
00076         stack->removeEndpoint(this);
00077     }
00078 }

00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 // Function: setPortID()
00110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void EndpointItem::setPortID(unsigned int portID)
00112 {
00113     // Release the old id if valid.
00114     if (portID_ >= 0)
00115     {
00116         parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent()->getPortIDFactory().freeID(portID_);
00117     }
00118 
00119     portID_ = portID;
00120 
00121     if (portID_ >= 0)
00122     {
00123         parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent()->getPortIDFactory().usedID(portID_);
00124     }
00125 
00126     updateText();
00127 }

00129 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 // Function: setHighlight()
00131 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 void EndpointItem::setHighlight(HighlightMode mode)
00133 {
00134     switch (mode)
00135     {
00136     case HIGHLIGHT_OFF:
00137         {
00138             setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0));
00139             setZValue(0.0);
00140             break;
00141         }
00142 
00143     case HIGHLIGHT_ALLOWED:
00144         {
00145             setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
00146             setZValue(1000.0);
00147             break;
00148         }
00149 
00150     case HIGHLIGHT_HOVER:
00151         {
00152             setPen(QPen(Qt::red, 2));
00153             setZValue(1000.0);
00154             break;
00155         }
00156     }
00157 }

00191 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 // Function: setDirection()
00193 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 void EndpointItem::setDirection(DrawDirection dir)
00195 {
00196     // Update the visuals based on the new direction.
00197     if (dir == DIR_RIGHT)
00198     {
00199         textLabel_->setPos(-WIDTH / 2 + 5, 2 - HEIGHT / 2);
00200     }
00201     else
00202     {
00203         textLabel_->setPos(-WIDTH / 2 + ARROW_WIDTH + 5, 2 - HEIGHT / 2);
00204     }
00205 
00206     dir_ = dir;
00207     update();
00208 }

00210 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 // Function: getDirectionVector()
00212 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00213 QVector2D EndpointItem::getDirectionVector() const
00214 {
00215     switch (dir_)
00216     {
00217     case DIR_LEFT:
00218         {
00219             return QVector2D(-1.0f, 0.0f);
00220         }
00221 
00222     case DIR_RIGHT:
00223         {
00224             return QVector2D(1.0f, 0.0f);
00225         }
00226 
00227     default:
00228         {
00229             // Should not be possible.
00230             Q_ASSERT(false);
00231             return QVector2D();
00232         }
00233     }
00234 }

00286 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287 // Function: paint()
00288 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00289 void EndpointItem::paint(QPainter* painter, QStyleOptionGraphicsItem const* option, QWidget*)
00290 {
00291     // Determine the arrow offset.
00292     int arrowOffsetX = -WIDTH / 2;
00293 
00294     if (dir_ == DIR_RIGHT)
00295     {
00296         arrowOffsetX = WIDTH / 2 - ARROW_WIDTH;
00297     }
00298 
00299     // Draw the base rectangle.
00300     painter->setBrush(brush());
00301     painter->setPen(pen());
00302     painter->drawRect(boundingRect());
00303 
00304     // Draw the endpoint arrow background.
00305     painter->setBrush(QBrush(QColor(222, 222, 222)));
00306     painter->drawRect(QRectF(arrowOffsetX, -HEIGHT / 2, ARROW_WIDTH, HEIGHT));
00307 
00308     // Draw the actual arrow.
00309     painter->setBrush(QBrush(QColor(164, 164, 164)));
00310     QPolygon arrowPoly(4);
00311 
00312     if ((dir_ == DIR_LEFT && type_ == MCAPI_ENDPOINT_IN) ||
00313         (dir_ == DIR_RIGHT && type_ == MCAPI_ENDPOINT_OUT))
00314     {
00315         arrowPoly.putPoints(0, 4, arrowOffsetX, -HEIGHT / 2, arrowOffsetX + ARROW_WIDTH,
00316                             0, arrowOffsetX, HEIGHT / 2, arrowOffsetX, -HEIGHT / 2);
00317     }
00318     else
00319     {
00320         arrowPoly.putPoints(0, 4, arrowOffsetX + ARROW_WIDTH, -HEIGHT / 2, arrowOffsetX, 0,
00321                             arrowOffsetX + ARROW_WIDTH, HEIGHT / 2, arrowOffsetX + ARROW_WIDTH, -HEIGHT / 2);
00322     }
00323 
00324     painter->drawConvexPolygon(arrowPoly);
00325 
00326     // Draw a selection rectangle if the item is selected.
00327     if (option->state & QStyle::State_Selected)
00328     {
00329         painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
00330 
00331         painter->setPen(QPen(Qt::white, 0, Qt::SolidLine));
00332         painter->drawRect(boundingRect().adjusted(0.5, 0.5, -0.5, -0.5));
00333 
00334         painter->setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine));
00335         painter->drawRect(boundingRect().adjusted(0.5, 0.5, -0.5, -0.5));
00336     }
00337 }

00339 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00340 // Function: editEndpoint()
00341 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00342 void EndpointItem::editEndpoint()
00343 {
00344     EndpointEditDialog dialog(0, this);
00345 
00346     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
00347     {
00348         setName(dialog.getName());
00349         setType(dialog.getType());
00350         setConnectionType(dialog.getConnectionType());
00351     }
00352 }

00354 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00355 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00356 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00357 void EndpointItem::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00358 {
00359     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00360     if (static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00361     {
00362         return;
00363     }
00364 
00365     QGraphicsItem::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00366 
00367     setZValue(100);
00368 
00369     EndpointStack* stack = dynamic_cast<EndpointStack*>(parentItem());
00370 
00371     if (stack != 0)
00372     {
00373         stack->onMoveEndpoint(this);
00374     }
00375 }
00376 
00377 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00378 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00379 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00380 void EndpointItem::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00381 {
00382     QGraphicsItem::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00383 
00384     EndpointStack* stack = dynamic_cast<EndpointStack*>(parentItem());
00385 
00386     if (stack != 0)
00387     {
00388         stack->onReleaseEndpoint(this);
00389 
00390         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00391 
00392         // Check if the port position was really changed.
00393         if (oldPos_ != pos())
00394         {
00395             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new EndpointMoveCommand(this, oldPos_));
00396         }
00397         else
00398         {
00399             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00400         }
00401 
00402         // End the position update of the connections.
00403         foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, getConnections())
00404         {
00405             conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00406         }
00407 
00408         // Add the undo command to the edit stack only if it has changes.
00409         if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || oldPos_ != pos())
00410         {
00411             static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd, false);
00412         }
00413     }
00414 
00415     setZValue(0);
00416 }
00417 
00418 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00419 // Function: mouseDoubleClickEvent()
00420 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00421 void EndpointItem::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00422 {
00423     QGraphicsItem::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00424     
00425     if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00426     {
00427         editEndpoint();
00428     }
00429 }

00431 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00432 // Function: updateText()
00433 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00434 void EndpointItem::updateText()
00435 {
00436     if (parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent() != 0)
00437     {
00438         textLabel_->setHtml("<b>Name: </b>" + name_ +
00439                             "<br><b>Endpoint:</b> &lt;HW, " +
00440                             QString::number(parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent()->getID()) +
00441                              ", " + QString::number(portID_) + "&gt;");
00442         update();
00443     }
00444     else
00445     {
00446         textLabel_->setHtml("<b>Name: </b>" + name_ +
00447                             "<br><b>Endpoint:</b> &lt;HW, unset, unset&gt;");
00448         update();
00449     }
00450 }

00467 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00468 // Function: canConnect()
00469 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00470 bool EndpointItem::canConnect(EndpointItem const* other) const
00471 {
00472     return (getConnections().empty() && type_ != other->type_ &&
00473             connType_ == other->connType_);
00474 }

00476 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00477 // Function: itemChange()
00478 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00479 QVariant EndpointItem::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant &value)
00480 {
00481     switch (change)
00482     {
00483     case ItemPositionHasChanged:
00484         {
00485             emit contentChanged();
00486             break;
00487         }
00488 
00489     case ItemScenePositionHasChanged:
00490         {
00491             foreach (EndpointConnection* connection, getConnections())
00492             {
00493                 connection->updatePosition();
00494             }
00495             
00496             break;
00497         }
00498     }
00499 
00500     return QAbstractGraphicsShapeItem::itemChange(change, value);
00501 }

00511 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00512 // Function: updateVisuals()
00513 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00514 void EndpointItem::updateVisuals()
00515 {
00516     switch (connType_)
00517     {
00518     case MCAPI_TYPE_MESSAGE:
00519         {
00520             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(215, 249, 217)));
00521             break;
00522         }
00523 
00524     case MCAPI_TYPE_SCALAR:
00525         {
00526             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(229, 215, 249)));
00527             break;
00528         }
00529 
00530     case MCAPI_TYPE_PACKET:
00531         {
00532             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(215, 241, 249)));
00533             break;
00534         }
00535     }
00536 }

00562 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00563 // Function: createBusInterface()
00564 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00565 void EndpointItem::createBusInterface(MappingComponentItem* mappingComp)
00566 {
00567     if (mappingComp == 0)
00568     {
00569         return;
00570     }
00571     
00572     // If the bus interface exists, just retrieve the port ID from it.
00573     BusInterface* oldBusIf = mappingComp->componentModel()->getBusInterface(getFullName());
00574 
00575     if (oldBusIf != 0)
00576     {
00577         setPortID(oldBusIf->getMCAPIPortID());
00578         return;
00579     }
00580 
00581     // Otherwise generate a new port ID.
00582     setPortID(mappingComp->getPortIDFactory().getID());
00583 
00584     // Add a bus interface to the mapping component.
00585     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf(new BusInterface());
00586     busIf->setName(getFullName());
00587     busIf->setMCAPIPortID(portID_);
00588 
00589     if (type_ == MCAPI_ENDPOINT_OUT)
00590     {
00591         busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::MASTER);
00592     }
00593     else
00594     {
00595         busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::SLAVE);
00596     }
00597 
00598     switch (connType_)
00599     {
00600     case MCAPI_TYPE_MESSAGE:
00601         {
00602             busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "mcapi_message", "1.0"));
00603             break;
00604         }
00605 
00606     case MCAPI_TYPE_PACKET:
00607         {
00608             busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "mcapi_packet", "1.0"));
00609             break;
00610         }
00611 
00612     case MCAPI_TYPE_SCALAR:
00613         {
00614             busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "mcapi_scalar", "1.0"));
00615             break;
00616         }
00617     }
00618 
00619     mappingComp->componentModel()->addBusInterface(busIf);
00620 }
00621 
00622 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00623 // Function: removeBusInterface()
00624 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00625 void EndpointItem::removeBusInterface(MappingComponentItem* mappingComp)
00626 {
00627     if (mappingComp != 0)
00628     {
00629         mappingComp->componentModel()->removeBusInterface(getFullName());
00630 
00631         // Reset the port id.
00632         setPortID(-1);
00633     }
00634 }

00636 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00637 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00638 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00639 void EndpointItem::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00640 {
00641     QGraphicsItem::mousePressEvent(event);
00642 
00643     oldPos_ = pos();
00644 
00645     // Begin position update for the connections.
00646     foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, getConnections())
00647     {
00648         conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00649     }
00650 }
